title: Dinosaur National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations           A section of Liz Bradford's painting showing a Diplodocus in the distance, three Stegosauruses (two adults and a juvenile,) and, in the stream, a Camptosaurus. Liz Bradford  Video: The Art of Dinosaur Reconstruction  This 15-second video offers a view of what the ancient world of the dinosaurs might have looked like and records the development of scientific artist Liz Bradford's painting, from sketches to completion.  Â         Click here to visit an on-line multi-media exhibit that gives you an intimate look at the remarkable fossils of Dinosaur National Monument.
